structure.unit: A JUDICIAL SUPPORT AGENCIES AND PERSONNEL

law.catch_line: Deferred prosecution -- Application -- Listing of persons with records sealed.

text.section: The Administrative Office of the Courts shall create an application for use by a defendant requesting deferred prosecution under KRS 218A.14151 which shall include a space for the defendant to indicate all prior convictions and expungements.

The Chief Justice may authorize the Administrative Office of the Courts to develop, collect, and maintain a listing of persons who have had their records sealed under KRS 218A.14151, 218A.275, and 218A.276. The list may be utilized by the courts and attorneys practicing in the courts to determine whether the person is eligible to participate in a deferred prosecution under KRS 218A.14151 or a treatment or recovery program under KRS 218A.275 or 218A.276.

law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch.2, sec.100, effective June 8, 2011.
